name: cssSweet
description: cssSweet is a suite of tools for processing (S)CSS. It comes with several output modifiers to modify CSS values, and a plugin that concatenates and processes (S)CSS from specified chunks to a minified CSS file. Version 2+ also concatenates and minifies JS with a 2nd plugin.
author: @sepiariver YJ Tso

properties.name: percOpt
properties.description: Can be 'input', 'spectrum' or 'average'.

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: Valid, 6-character hex against which to evaluate light and dark hex values.

properties.name: custom_scss_chunks
properties.description: Name of chunk, or comma-separated list of chunks, from which to parse (S)CSS.

properties.name: custom_css_filename
properties.description: Name of file to output custom compiled CSS.

properties.name: dev_scss_chunks
properties.description: Name of chunk, or comma-separated list of chunks, from which to parse (S)CSS in DEV mode.

properties.name: dev_css_filename
properties.description: Name of file to output custom compiled CSS in DEV mode.

properties.name: dev_mode
properties.description: Enable DEV mode.

properties.name: custom_css_path
properties.description: Full path for directory to which to OUTPUT the final CSS file.

properties.name: minify_custom_css
properties.description: Minify CSS on output. MUST be enabled for SCSS processing.

properties.name: scss_import_paths
properties.description: Optionally set import paths to check for SCSS imports. All @import paths must be relative to these.

properties.name: strip_css_comment_blocks
properties.description: Strips CSS comment blocks on output, only IF minification is ENABLED.

properties.name: css_output_format
properties.description: Choose either 'Expanded' (default), 'Nested' or 'Compact' CSS output, IF minification is DISABLED.

properties.name: custom_js_chunks
properties.description: Name of chunk, or comma-separated list of chunks, from which to parse JS.

properties.name: custom_js_filename
properties.description: Name of file to output custom compiled JS.

properties.name: dev_js_chunks
properties.description: Name of chunk, or comma-separated list of chunks, from which to parse JS in DEV mode.

properties.name: dev_js_filename
properties.description: Name of file to output custom compiled JS in DEV mode.

properties.name: dev_mode
properties.description: Enable DEV mode.

properties.name: custom_js_path
properties.description: Full path for directory to which to OUTPUT the final JS file.

properties.name: minify_custom_js
properties.description: Minify JS on output.

properties.name: strip_js_comment_blocks
properties.description: Strips JS comment blocks on output.

chunks.name: csss.custom_css.scss
chunks.description: Sample chunk only. It's recommended to create your own chunk(s) with a unique name(s) and set them in the saveCustomCss plugin properties.
